fixed_skill.desc: Increase party's critical rate by 6.5%/6.8%/7.2%. For every 10% of the user's critical rate, increase party's critical rate by 1.1%/1.2%/1.2% more, up to 4.4%/4.6%/4.8%. Lasts for 3 turns.
fixed_skill.name: Revolution

innate_skill.desc: Deal Psy damage to 1 foe equal to 138.9/145.9/152.9% of Attack. Deal a Technical and increase damage by 50% for foes with a spiritual ailment.
innate_skill.name: Psycho Force

passive_skill.desc: Increase critical rate by 14.8%. When using a skill on an ally, increase main target's critical damage by 22% for 2 turns.
passive_skill.name: Feast of the Frenzied

passive_skill.desc: Increase critical rate by 14.8%. When using a skill on an ally, increase main target's critical damage by 24.7% for 2 turns.
passive_skill.name: Feast of the Frenzied I

passive_skill.desc: Increase critical rate by 14.8%. When using a skill on an ally, increase main target's critical damage by 27.6% for 2 turns.
passive_skill.name: Feast of the Frenzied II

passive_skill.desc: Increase critical rate by 14.8%. When using a skill on an ally, increase main target's critical damage by 30% for 2 turns.
passive_skill.name: Feast of the Frenzied III

showtime_skill.desc: Increase party's damage by 29.5%/31.6%/33.6% for 2 turns.
showtime_skill.name: Highlight
